page.title: 10TOURISM IN RODNEY STOKE
page.content: Although only a small village Rodney Stoke is an attractive unspoiled settlement and several houses particularly along the A371 offer holiday accommadation or{Bed & {Breakfast}.It is a good place for people who want a quiet holiday. People can visit the resort of Weston, the historic cities of Bath and Wells and the Gorge and caves at Cheddar. There is also the opportunity for hill walking and pony-trekking over Mendip and people also come because of the unspoiled Mendip scenery. One holiday home in Rodney Stoke is owned by people who live in London. The M5 is easily accessible for tourists who wish to travel south to Devon and Cornwall or north to Bristol and Birmingham. The closest interchange is about 12 miles to the west.
